short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Solver for reCAPTCHA, FunCAPTCHA, and all CAPTCHA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Solve any CAPTCHA freely with NopeCHA for Chrome

Ranked as "the best free CAPTCHA solver" by HackerNoon, NopeCHA is able to solve all popular challenges such as reCAPTCHA, FunCAPTCHA, and more. View the complete list of supported challenges at https://developers.nopecha.com

Use NopeCHA for Chrome to:
• Automate sign-ups and logins on websites. No more manual solving.
• Bypass CAPTCHAs on any website with ease.
• Keep your session running in websites that require periodic verification like Google Colab.

Do more with NopeCHA with your favorite programming languages:
• Seamless integration into Selenium, Puppeteer, and other browser automation tools.
• Use NopeCHA API to in your Python, Node.js, or any other programming language.
• Extract words from documents, images, or any other source with our state-of-the-art OCR API. 

Best of all:
• Free for personal use, NopeCHA works seamlessly across all major websites, providing a smooth browsing experience without interruptions.

With up to 3+ million users worldwide, NopeCHA is the go-to solution for browser automation.

Happy automating!

• • •

Questions? Reach out to us on Discord: https://nopecha.com/discord

Feedback? Open an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/NopeCHALLC/nopecha-extension

Explore our developer documentation: https://developers.nopecha.com
